name: Air Hockey Extended
description: Classic Air Hockey game has new features now! The game becomes much more interesting. You can grab super power and build protection wall or lock enemy paddle. What do you think about breaking borders? Or what if enemy paddle becomes glass and you can break it to pieces?! Wow! Unbelievable! You haven't played such a game yet. Of course this game provides real attractive air hockey physics. Also you can easily turn off extended mode and play good old classic game.
